ygData.subject: Re: Financial Aid
ygData.msgSnippet: if you are in freeport, go to the north ro desert, kill orc raiders and sand scarabs. i can make 10 plat a day doing such. and since the orcs con green to me
ygData.messageBody:
if you are in freeport, go to the north ro desert, kill orc raiders and
sand scarabs. i can make 10 plat a day doing such. and since the orcs con
green to me (i am 14, so i dont know how they con to lvl 8), it's quick and
easy.

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 14th lvl enchanter

At 02:13 PM 4/26/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>I'm on Innoruuk also...but I've lost 7 to 8 plats to bugs so far and I
>havent been doing that great with loot...I just got the enchant silver spell
>and the jewelry kit...but now I'm broke...cant help much right now...If you
>come to Freeport and need the enchant silver spell from Neriak, I'll give
>you a hand to get it.
>Skara
>
